Spirit Tide.name: Spirit Tide
Spirit Tide.flavor: Your spirit companion lashes out at an enemy, sending a swirling storm of spirits to batter other nearby foes.
Spirit Tide.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and each enemy within 5 squares of the target takes 1d10 damage.

Spirit Flow.name: Spirit Flow
Spirit Flow.flavor: Spirits swirl around your ally and your spirit companion as the two disappear, and then each reappears where the other just stood.
Spirit Flow.effect: You teleport the target and your spirit companion, swapping their positions.

Spirit Storm.name: Spirit Storm
Spirit Storm.flavor: A wind howls around your enemy as dozens of minor storm spirits appear and attack it. Your allies can trade positions inside the storm with a thought.
Spirit Storm.effect: The burst creates a zone of storm spirits that lasts until the end of the encounter. While within the zone, any ally gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls against the target. In addition, any ally within the zone can teleport as a move action, swapping positions with another ally within the zone.
